title: Drawing, "Sketch of Valley near Meadow Creek, Utah", July 25, 1871
medium:
Recto: Graphite, brush and black wash and white gouache on gray-green wove paper.
Verso: Graphite on gray-green wove paper.
signed: Signed and dated in graphite, at upper right: July 25th 1871 T. M.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite over a mountain, at upper left center: very big in shadow; and again at upper right: Before near, Meadow Creek / looking toward  July 25th 1871 T. M.; and at lower left corner: (8)
Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right center: caves; and again at upper right: near Meadow Creek / looking toward ... .; [according to Rudolph Berliner in 1942] in pen and ink: No. 311.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of the valley floor with Meadow Creek, rushing through in cnetral foreground surrounded by hills and mountains in middle ground and distance.
Verso, in opposite direction: View of a mountain.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch of Valley near Meadow Creek, Utah", July 25, 1871.
July 25, 1871. Recto: Graphite, brush and black wash and white gouache on gray-green wove paper.
Verso: Graphite on gray-green wove paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-8.
